text: Powell County is a county located in the U.S. state of Montana. As of the 2020 census, the population was 6,946. Its county seat is Deer Lodge. ==References== ==Other websites== * Grant-Kohrs Ranch National Historic Site * Montana State Prison * Clark Fork Watershed Education Program * Old Montana Prison Museums * Powell County Chamber of Commerce * Powell County Website Category:Montana counties Category:1901 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in Montana
title: Powell County, Montana
